mean_cn: n. 风景照片，风景胜地；  adj. 风景的，景色优美的，舞台背景的，舞台的
mean_en: having, providing, or relating to a pleasing or beautiful view of natural scenery (such as mountains, hills, valleys, etc.)
word_etyma: scen场景 + ic形容词后缀 → scenic 自然景色
short_phrase: a scenic spot in the woods
sentence: We stopped whenever we reached a scenic spot and took some pictures.
sentence_trans: 我们每到一个景点就停下来，然后拍拍照。
